TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program 2 - Cinematic Trailer - 4K Wallpapers

Articles.Content:
I'm so excited for this game that I had to take the time to produce some 4K wallpapers from the cinematic trailer. They have been upscaled, deblurred and hopefully because of the black bars should work on a variety of monitor aspect ratios. Now I'm going to watch the trailer a few more times!

Google Drive Zip: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LKdy6WE1vkdNtKe3FguTDMVi5_Nah_tt/view?usp=sharing
Imgur: https://imgur.com/gallery/FWgOopW
Oh man thanks! That Duna like planet with the Orion spaceship is now my desktop background!
Oh, that is going to my UserLoadingScreens folder, thanks man.
